TopicTitle: Experiment Results in Galileo Planet Pack

Articles.Content:
I installed the Galileo Planet Pack, but all the experiments in every biome give only the default "You record crew's assessment of the situation" -style results. As far as I know the mod should have unique logs for experiments in different planets, so how can I get them to show in my game?

 

Edit: Turns out the custom science reports have been temporarily disabled in the current version of GPP, so this question has been answered for now.

Edited May 7, 2017 by Renofox
